tool_description: Get all english synonyms from a given word
name: English synonyms
title: English synonyms

api_list.name: Get Synonyms
api_list.description: Get all synonyms from a given english word
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://english-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com/bourgeois"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://english-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
